name: VBMcgi
short_description: VBMcgi is the CGI cross-platform C++ library. It is the only CGI library in C++ that allows development with 3-tier architecture, and protect intellectual property. www.vbmcgi.org. For version 4.0 or newer, go to http://sourceforge.net/projects/vblib/
